notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected potential damaged structures in Chone area in Manabi Province, Ecuador, located at approximately 120 km south of the 16 April 2016 Muisne earthquake main shock epicentre. Using a Pleiades satellite image acquired the 19 April 2016 and a WorldView-2 image acquired the 02 December 2013, UNITAR - UNOSAT identified 162 potentially damaged structures of which 62 were destroyed, 36 severely damaged, and 64 moderately damaged. This is a preliminary analysis and not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR - UNOSAT.
